Name: Evangelia Aspropotamiti
Workshop Goals: I used ML in my bachelor and did an ML internship before my masters degree, so I would like to get inspired by this workshop on how to apply machine learning once again to my current work as a PhD in quantum physics. I wish to see how other physicists implement it in their research, discuss with them and also ask for advice on how it's applicable to my work.
Interest in ML methods/data: I have worked with CNN's and untrained neural networks
Interest in Physics: I work in theoretical Quantum Optomechanics, in the theoretical quantum optics group
